## Decision to not use the HPC

-   2000m Grid for LCP Analysis
-   All Start/End nodes are in optimal habitat (dense forest=1)
-   53 valid nodes is perfect (10km = 6 valid nodes)
-   HPC is no longer needed

## Improve Reproducability

-   Still 3 different working files (Surface Preparation, LCP Calculation and Visualisation)

-   run_pipeline.py coordinates these 3 files and ensures that the Code is Reproducible on every Operating System

-   HPC Code is in depriciated_code and could be reused with small changes when a larger area is being investigated

-   OSM data is downloaded automatically for the provided osmnx Geocode, but CLC must be downloaded mannually

-   Automatic Environment Setup integrated

-   Just clone the Repo and start run_pipeline.py and the entire Project runs
